ygData.subject: Re: My Experience With a Level 2 Cleric
ygData.msgSnippet: uhm, well, considering that minor healing only heals 10hp at a time, and you WERE on level 2,
ygData.messageBody:
uhm, well, considering that minor healing only heals 10hp at a time, and
you WERE on level 2, <what level warrior were you trying to heal? and
remember warriors have a good bit of hp> did you have any mana adding
items? there's always things to get you more mana...mana adding items
till around 20 or so, and then wis adding items.....

(\/)ystix Spellchaser
lv 50 human cleric of The Rathe

bigmack wrote:

> I just created a Cleric today and got him up to level 2. At the
> guild shop I noticed so many classes of spells...attack spells,
> healings spells, and other spells were all handled by different
> NPC's. I'll be spending A LOT of money on spells. I do have a minor
> gripe with clerics, though. They just don't have enough total mana,
> and the Minor Healing spell isn't strong enough. I was grouped up
> with a Warrior and after wasting all of my mana healing him four
> times, only half of his health had grown back. Clerics need more
> mana! What do you think? Albus the Cleric, on The Tribunal Server
